name: Laurel Coronet
description:
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Dendro Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Skill:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro</color> Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Skill:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro</color> Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytext: "There is a time appointed for all things to live and die, and the cycle continues on forever."
